name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Jasiri | Tokenize Your Purchases, Unlock Bankable Digital Assets

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
JASIRI E-COMMERCE BROWSER ADD-ON:

*’Add-on’ and ‘Extension’ are used interchangeably
*’Vault’ and ‘Wallet’ are also used interchangeably

Unlock🔓 and experience the full economic and financial value of your recently purchased smartphones, laptops, tablets, or smartwatches as bankable digital assets, and Web3 legal smart property title deeds!🎉

🌟 Exciting Update (11/10/2024) 🌟

You can now unlock the value of your recently purchased smart appliances! Tokenize your smart refrigerators, ovens, robotic vacuums, washing machines, blenders, coffee makers, and more from top brands like Samsung, Bosch, Amazon, LG, GE, Whirlpool, and Miele. Dive into the future of home technology and discover how your appliances can work for you! 💡✨

KEY BENEFITS:

✅Asset Tokenization💵
- Tokenize your recently purchased tech gadgets - smartphones, laptops, tablets, or smartwatches
- Earn bankable digital assets equal to the US Dollar value of your recently purchased tech gadgets
- These digital assets are NOT conventional financial debt, and only represent the equity or stock you own in your purchased tech gadgets

✅Full Web3 Legal Digital Ownership📜
- Mint and buy an accompanying legal smart property title for your asset to record and stamp the asset’s ownership data on a globally distributed, common immutable ledger
- Titles are non-fungible, and validate digital ownership of your tech purchases
- Titles cost a one-time forever fee of 3.99% to the US Dollar value of your asset - no subscription, no renewal fees!
- An additional feature, Titles are being backed by proper US LLCs to give you and your assets more benefits like legal recognition, governance rights, protection from debt collectors for your tech gadgets and more(stay tuned to our X and Medium for more). 


✅Multiple Global Stores Supported🛒
- Use Jasiri with Amazon.com , Alibaba.com , and Aliexpress.com
- We have many more stores in our waitlist, and you will have the chance to suggest more stores if the above don't work for you, just connect with us on X(@unlockwithjsr)

✅Integrated With Smartphone Wallets📲
- To securely store your assets without exposing your account’s private key, use the extension with the Jasiri Mobile Vault or the Pera Algorand Wallet!
- The Jasiri Mobile Vault is currently available for Android here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.jasiriwallet&hl=en&gl=US 🎉
It’s ideal for non-technical users!
- IOS users use Pera Algorand Wallet for iOS right here: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/pera-algo-wallet/id1459898525 
- This integration prevents your assets from being stolen in hacks and breaches that happen frequently over the internet

✅Universally Available🌍
- Amazon.com , Alibaba.com and Aliexpress.com all ship to 100+ countries globally
- Jasiri E-commerce Add-on is also available in those countries. Please check on the respective e-commerce sites to know if they ship smartphones, laptops, tablets and smartwatches to your country

---

GETTING STARTED:

1️⃣ Download Your Wallet  
- Android: Get the Jasiri Mobile Vault here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.jasiriwallet&pcampaignid=web_share .

- iOS & Android: Download the Pera Algorand Wallet for iOS(https://apps.apple.com/us/app/pera-algo-wallet/id1459898525) or Android(https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.algorand.android&hl=en)

- Create your self-custody account and opt-in to UNLOCK Asset (Asset ID: 1256765304) in the "Assets" section of your Pera or Jasiri Wallet.

*Buy 1-2 ALGO Tokens (worth $0.12 each) via debit/credit card, p2p or bank transfer on Pera, Jasiri Wallets, or earn free ALGO on Coinbase and then transfer it to your Pera/Jasiri Wallet Address: https://www.coinbase.com/earn/algorand . The Algorand Network, which we use to record transactions, charges small transaction fees of 1 ALGO or less for decentralization and to prevent bot actions, making your experience safer, legitimate, and more secure.

2️⃣ Add the Jasiri E-commerce Browser Add-on to your Google Chrome Browser. Google Chrome is a multi-platform browser that works on MacOS, Windows, ChromeOS, and Linux.

3️⃣ Activate the Add-on while on your Amazon/Alibaba/Aliexpress Account-Orders page.

4️⃣ Connect Your Wallet by scanning the WalletConnect QR code that appears in the add-on when you click "Connect Your Wallet."

5️⃣ Scan and Tokenize your proof-of-purchase by clicking "Show Tokenizable Orders" and selecting any smartphone, tablet, laptop, or smartwatch. Up to 70% of its USD value will be credited to your Vault account.

*To buy a smart Web3 property title, purchase USDC on your Pera or Jasiri Wallet(over 10+ payment methods are available) or through Coinbase(https://www.coinbase.com/learn/crypto-basics/what-is-usdc), then transfer to your wallet.
*USDC helps you save in 'Tokenized'/'Digital' US Dollars

6️⃣ Buy the smart Web3 legal property title on your tokenized purchase via the add-on.

7️⃣ Repeat! 🙌

Note:  
- Pera Wallet is available for both iOS and Android.  
- Jasiri Wallet is currently Android-only, with an iOS waitlist open. 


If you found anything positive about the app extension, feel free to leave a review here. You can also add some suggestions to your comment on what you think we can work on next as a feature.

For support, you can simply private message us on X(formerly Twitter) at @unlockwithjsr or click 'Support Hub' right on the extension's page view and leave a suggestion/idea/review.

LEARN MORE:

- Discover 19+ reasons to use Jasiri in this Medium article: https://medium.com/@blog.jasiriprotocol.org/world-first-tokenization-platform-for-your-valuable-consumer-electronics-aa992bdea3e1 .

Please use the Jasiri Vault/Wallet🔒 to create an account and connect to the add-on Android or the Pera Algorand Wallet for iOS. A 📱smartphone wallet is more secure compared to web-based wallets.

Web-based wallets/vaults🔒 store your account’s private keys to the browser, which exposes them to hackers and there have been numerous hacks of web wallets on the internet, this is why we highly recommend to our users, for the safety of their unlocked assets - to use the Jasiri Vault or the Pera Algorand Wallet!

Links:
1. Jasiri Mobile Vault for Android - https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.jasiriwallet&pcampaignid=web_share .
2. Pera Algorand Wallet for iOS - https://apps.apple.com/us/app/pera-algo-wallet/id1459898525 .

Jasiri App is the 🌐World’s First Tokenization Platform for Your Most Valuable Consumer Electronic Purchases.

Using the Jasiri Vault🔒, as opposed to other third-party wallets/vaults, also allows you to fully experience what the platform has to offer.

Stay connected with us on X(formerly Twitter) at @unlockwithjsr to participate in community polls and more
